entries.message:
Event Type: Software Upgrade
Start Time: 2023-03-25 02:05:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-03-25 06:05:00 UTC

We will be performing software upgrades in this location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment. During the course of this maintenance window, your instance will be rebooted, and will be unavailable for several minutes. Please be aware that as we do not have access to your filesystem, this reboot will not be as clean as if it were done from within your OS, so preparing your software/filesystem with a graceful shutdown of services and the VPS itself would be advised.

Event Type: Software Upgrade
Start Time: 2023-03-22 02:05:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-03-22 06:05:00 UTC

We will be performing software upgrades in this location as part of an ongoing effort to maintain an ideal hosting environment. During the course of this maintenance window, your instance will be rebooted, and will be unavailable for several minutes. Please be aware that as we do not have access to your filesystem, this reboot will not be as clean as if it were done from within your OS, so preparing your software/filesystem with a graceful shutdown of services and the VPS itself would be advised.

Some customers are currently experiencing issues deploying Bare Metal servers in our Bangalore location. Our engineering team is aware of this issue and is working diligently to resolve this as quickly as possible.

We will be performing maintenance on the deployment infrastructure supporting our Bare Metal products on Thursday, March 16, 2023 at 14:00 UTC.

During this time re-installation, deployments, and metadata services will not be available.

Upon conclusion of the maintenance, all Bare Metal functionality will return to normal.
An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.
